website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and practical set of fireplace tongs that makes moving logs simple and safe.
pros: A good price for a pair of tongs that work well
Rounded design helps to make it easy to grab and pick up logs
Can pick up wider logs than some tongs
cons: The product is a little heavier than other tongs at over 9 lbs

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated
customer_reviews.text: We did not need a fireplace 'set' as this is used for our outdoor campfire style pit (which is just some big rocks in a circle). This means zero clean up, rusting, etc. of the fancy firepits that most people (some who live in the country and can legally burn) buy now-a-days... :? (still trying to figure out why on that one). We store it from the rain by hanging it up by a simple long nail, under the carport. We've had it about a year now, and it's still in like new condition. we are very happy with this item. The photo shows our 'free & easy' firepit, on the left.
customer_reviews.author: Murlyn

customer_reviews.title: You need to learn how to use it if your a first time user
customer_reviews.text: It preformed like it states it's a sturdy tool that lifts the logs places them where you need them in the fire a great tool to have if you own indoor fireplace outdoor fire pit highly recommend buying one !!👨‍🍳🇺🇸
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: Super Item...Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This item is great...remember it is 26" long...I purchased it to turn logs in my new fire pit outside...it is absolutely perfect for that...I had started out to buy fireplace tools (3-4 different tools) but thought why should I pay extra $$$ when all I need are the tongs...this was a lot cheaper...thought I would take one of my hooks that I use to hang up flower hanging baskets as it has the hook, it is flat black, and it stands just tall enough so that the tongs won't drag the ground...this item is highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginina Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but cheap
customer_reviews.text: I use these to handle a crucible full of molten aluminum from my home foundry. They work, but they are not particularly high-quality. The black is just easily-scratched paint, not the wrought iron that it's clearly trying to emulate. The joints are simple rivets; it won't surprise me much when they start to wear out and need to be replaced with something more substantial. However, the price is good, and they perform their basic function well, so it's hard to complain.
customer_reviews.author: walrusman

customer_reviews.title: Works like you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: A great old fashioned simple fire log turner. A neat suprise is that it "collapses" down. You pull the handles out like you're trying to open and it "smashes" down horizontally - the handles come down to meet the part that touches the log and the "knees" spread outwards. I liked it because it made storage nice. It works just great. Not the most heavy duty item but works great for turning logs on a fire.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer.

customer_reviews.title: Sexy black tongs.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to wear these thongs next to my fireplace but they did not fit in my butt. So I used them for picking up logs instead. They worked for that. Although these are a bit flimsier than the ones I ordered two years ago. I thought they were the same brand, and the design looks identical, but the halves are very loose and jangly.
customer_reviews.author: archiefl98

customer_reviews.title: The only fireplace tool you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: This is the only tool I ever use while playing with fire. I bought 3! I have one for the fireplace in the house, one for the fire pit in the yard, and one in the camper for campfires. It will easily hold a large chunk of wood to help you re-arrange or rebuild the fire. It will also delicately hold small coals. These are very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kuhlmann

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise work fine. I doubt they'll last a super long time
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit lightweight feeling, but otherwise work fine. I doubt they'll last a super long time, but for the price, I think they're worthwhile. Don't expect to pick up super heavy logs with one hand with these, but they work well to lift reasonable firewood and move around stuff in the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Dariushd

customer_reviews.title: A campers must have.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Great quality and have lasted a long time. I will be buying another set not because these broke but only because I lost mine while moving.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: handy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something I could move wood around in my earth oven, but could not find anything locally so Went to Amazon and found what I was looking for. It arrived in a reasonable time, even through the harsh snows, and it is exactly what I wanted. I am pleased with it and sure it will serve my needs for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Bernard E. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Not the wonder I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: But for the price, you can't beat 'em! I just wish they were easier to work with -- that big roundish part is a problem. They are great for picking up wood, but not for positioning it. The dip in the tong won,t let you maneuver the log, so when you want to reposition, you can't. It won't let you release it.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Sasaki

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: These are very light and did not hold up well. Bent too easily when used.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered multiples of this, work great for sitting around a campfire. Yes not made for larger logs but great for split wood sold at most campgrounds or gas stations
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Much needed for fireplace
customer_reviews.text: These are great because they open up so wide. They were also quite cheap, however, worked very well. I think they will hold up with time. I don't get the feeling that they'll fall apart soon. I guess we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: JohnJMU

customer_reviews.title: I love my tongs
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over town and some online,and I could not find one like it in town,and very few online.I purchased it for my fire place for the small pieces that break off the larger pieces and have not burned.It's so I can grab them and place them back on the fire without getting bunned.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Good for small pieces of wood, not study enough for big pieces
customer_reviews.text: The tongs work okay if you have small pieces of hot wood to move around. For pieces larger than 8" in circumference they aren't study enough. I have only used them two or three times since I got them a couple of months ago, and I have been running the wood stove every day.
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good tongs
customer_reviews.text: These tongs get lots of use in our fireplace. The best part is how they completely fold up to a much smaller size, making them great for when we head out camping this spring. The tongs are sturdy but not too heavy or clumsy. They are a great addition to our fireplace tools.
customer_reviews.author: Love the Birds

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tongs to use in the firebox on my offset smoker as a poker as well as tongs. They work flawlessly for this purpose and would I recommend them. They have worked great to pick up and break up small coals, sticks and logs as I have needed. They feel a little flimsy with logs, as I use some split logs measuring a foot or more long, but it does the job. They also do fold up nicely for storage which brings the 26" tongs down to a little under 17". Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our outdoor fire pit. They are pretty sturdy. Good hinges and the paint should protect them for a good while. I've used this a couple of times and it doesn't have any difficulty lifting rather large logs. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Fah-Say

customer_reviews.title: Works but- not the greatest quality.  Great price though.
customer_reviews.text: This item is low cost and the quality matches the price. It does the job, but I only expect it to last 1 winter. Next time I will buy a more expensive, higher quality item.
customer_reviews.author: C. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tongs to take camping. They seem to work very well. They work great on normal sized chopped wood and don't look like they will bend (like some reviews say). They are simple and lightweight, great for easy packing, and collapse. I don't know how long they will last, but for the low price, if I can get a couple of years out of them that would be fine. I would recommend these tongs to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: For small logs!
customer_reviews.text: They work well for small logs under 10 inches but if you are buying to use with wood stove where you have logs 12-24 inches the tongs are a little weak. But not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Army Wife 13B

customer_reviews.title: These are good tongs for shuffling wood in the stove
customer_reviews.text: These are good tongs for shuffling wood in the stove. I've found them pretty easy to grab with and I've moved some pretty heavy pieces in our stove without any problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Let's just get it out there: they feel cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Let's just get it out there: they feel cheap. Most of the time I am afraid I am not actually holding the wood or they are going to drop it. I wouldn't buy these again...probably something a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I lived
customer_reviews.text: Well, that may be a bit dramatic. I lived just fine before I bought these. However, they are a godsend to move logs around in my smoker, my fire pit and the fireplace. They work great even with large logs.
customer_reviews.author: Zorro Oscuro

customer_reviews.title: need two hands
customer_reviews.text: Its great because it opens wide for large logs, folds nicely to a compact shape, holds heat well, just wish it was usable with one hand. Great value though! We use it for an outdoor fire pit and it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I use this tongs when I'm camping to move logs around.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great Tongs
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are a great value for the price. They look just like the picture and work great. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants to play with fire.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Weak, lasted less than a week
customer_reviews.text: After just one week, the rivets have loosened and now the assembly is all floppy and bent. Pretty weak.
customer_reviews.author: CF-JM

customer_reviews.title: good tongs for a fire pit
customer_reviews.text: These are for a fire pit. They work fine for moving the fire around and opening the door once the fire is going. It is not meant for big fireplace logs I don't think but it seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Paulin

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: does what its meant to do not heavy duty but strong enough good buy for the money spent I recommend for small pit fires
customer_reviews.author: fun cuber

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: A piece of junk. Would have returned it but my UPS charge would have too much
customer_reviews.author: C. Michael Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's doing the job by the fire pit. Maybe could have used the larger set of grippers but it serves it purpose at the right price
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy  RIchardson

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Homebasix 5 pc set, unaware that tongs came with it, so I now have one extra. You can't beat the price, it works great, 5 stars for the tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: nice product. Smaller than I expected. Works well. Happy with the purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: TheJohnHurlow

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made, thin metal, bend easily, but to do work
customer_reviews.text: cheaply made, thin metal, bend easily, but to do work. I have had to bend the item in my vice to fix it within 2 fireplace uses.
customer_reviews.author: RSchwanke

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving logs
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to move the logs in the fireplace use them every time I have a fire
customer_reviews.author: Julia44

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. Works well reaching into my fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P. Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are ok but hard to turn the wood when it gets caught on the curved end
customer_reviews.author: roxanne thomas

customer_reviews.title: ... have a fire pit in my backyard these are perfect for moving logs or putting Logs on highly suggest ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a fire pit in my backyard these are perfect for moving logs or putting Logs on highly suggest you have them in your fire pit arsenal
customer_reviews.author: Billy Flockhart

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy for the most part. Just don't expect to pick up 40lb logs with it. I would recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard F.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight Tongs - for small logs and pieces of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are well forged. They work perfectly. I've know domestically produced ones that were a big crooked; these Chinese ones are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: H. Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for moving charcoal around my smoker/grill, and it works like a charm. The ends do not have any sort of grip to them, but they still grab on to most charcoal chucks with ease. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wood stove, these come handy to move the wood or pick something up.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Larrowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tongs for my outdoor fire pit! Great price, fast shipping too! thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is as I thought it would be. I will use it for a fire pit in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it's made ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it's made ok. Just not long enough for an outside fire. Wanted it to be about 12" longer. Probably my fault.
customer_reviews.author: charles cook

customer_reviews.title: Only issue, is NOT made in USA
customer_reviews.text: They are good tongs.. I just wish that there were more Made in USA products available.. I would love to see more American Made Products
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Tomaino

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to move hot burning logs in the fire place. It is safer to use than your hand. No burns.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: keep your hands and face from getting too close to the fire
customer_reviews.author: taper002

customer_reviews.title: Good tongs
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hard to manage, but after a little oil it worked perfectly. xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx
customer_reviews.author: G. Schreuder

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for our small fire pit. They easily handle 6" logs. Not super heavy-duty, but good enough and the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Terry M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap tongs
customer_reviews.text: The delivered tongs did not match the picture that was online. I thought I was purchasing a heavier duty single hinge type like the picture showed. These are cheap flimsy accordion hinge type. They bend if you try to pick a decent size fireplace log up with them. I'll throw them away as soon as I can find a decent one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as depicted; what I wanted. Purchase process fairly simple and delivery quick.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Tongs for the tongs
customer_reviews.text: I do not think that these are any better than any other tongs, but for the price they are great. Using them outside for around a half a year still work well.
customer_reviews.author: Fred O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic log grabber. Easily holds logs 5-6 inch in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Becki Ross

customer_reviews.title: Patio Fireplace Handy Gadget
customer_reviews.text: My parents had a pair of these for a Buck Stove, when I bought a small adobe chimminey which has a small opening, I knew these would be perfect to reach in and move logs around. Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.author: gwenseibert

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Got these last year. Love them! Easy to use - light and durable
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: The work good. The only change to the design that I ...
customer_reviews.text: The work good. The only change to the design that I would make is to flatten the ends instead it being rounded. It makes it difficult to pick up small sticks and small ambers.
customer_reviews.author: Ric C

customer_reviews.title: Too clumsy
customer_reviews.text: These tongs were too heavy and clumsy for me to use. They looked much smaller and lighter in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: j3randk

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: fold up nicely, work well at campfires. The only problem is getting the kids away from them. Maybe red tape or a red handle would help.
customer_reviews.author: don juan

customer_reviews.title: cannot get in to turn logs but otherwise am completely satisfied so gave it a
customer_reviews.text: Tongs could be a little longer as when fire is hot, cannot get in to turn logs but otherwise am completely satisfied so gave it a 5
customer_reviews.author: lortsg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy fire tongs
customer_reviews.text: Husband was thrilled with these...just what he wanted to move the logs around in our firepit..Sure we'll get alot of use out of these.
customer_reviews.author: FLA LUV BUG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and I will enjoy using it. No more burnt fingers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are made of light grade metal and actually bend when you try to pick up or move a decent size log. They are pretty much worthless for anything larger than kindling.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great for any fire bug!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to handle wood in the fire that I can use it one handed and still have a beer in the other hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tres Doble V

customer_reviews.title: bends VERY easily
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on small pieces of wood. First time I tried something thicker than my forearm it warped badly though. Was able to bend it back with bare hands easily....and I'm far from Superman. Not very sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Murray Rothbard

customer_reviews.title: Tongs an added equipment to my other fireplace tools.
customer_reviews.text: I have several tools to manage items in the fireplace while it is burning and the tongs are an additional item and convenient as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not amazing, but for the price it does the job. If you're only going to light 10-20 fires per year, go with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hedges

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tongs!
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine to grab logs in the fireplace and move them around with more control than the poker, so great addition to firplace tools.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace Tongs
customer_reviews.text: The fireplace tongs seem to be of good quality. They were a gift but the recipient was thrilled with them.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Steigerwalt

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with this fireplace tong
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this fireplace tong. I received it in good time and it has been working well.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I would change if maybe make it a little longer, it can get a little hot when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Poulson

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This are exactly what we were looking for. We even gave some as gifts and they love them. Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: With the weather starting to get a little cooler I started building fires in our chiminea. In the past I have always just used a large stick to move the logs around in the fire. I thought I should use something more sturdy and found this item. Received it the other day and couldn't wait to use it so I just used it this evening. It was just what I needed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: vebbie

customer_reviews.title: fireplace tongs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as gift for my son. Shipping time was great. He said they were just what he needed.
customer_reviews.author: pbm

customer_reviews.title: It seems really good
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it a 4 star rating because I have not used it yet, but the price is right and it seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wood

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: have not used yet but i'm sure I will like it if I get a chance an see a need
customer_reviews.author: Fatdaddy

customer_reviews.title: Tongs that move wood around
customer_reviews.text: Get the job done. Move pieces of firewood around in the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Car Camping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of tongs ideal for car camping. It is lightweight, and folds compactly to store easily. It makes it possible to put wood on a hot campfire or fire in a fire pit, or to move logs in a hot fire around. I would not particularly recommend it for use in a home fireplace, as there are much better sturdier tongs available. The curved ends of this tong are best suited for certain size logs, which make it more difficult to use at home than standard sturdy non folding fireplace tongs. But for a simple, lightweight, folding, compact fireplace tongs for car camping, where it's compactness and light weight are an advantage, it's great. .
customer_reviews.author: paul sailer

customer_reviews.title: Great Scissor Tongs!
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are great and a must for camping! My parents have a set that are as old as dirt. They never had any problem picking up logs or stoking up the fire with theirs. I bought a set about 5 years ago for myself and they work awesome too. My brother needed one for his trips so when I found this I was skeptical due to the different pictures showing up on the product page but thankfully when the tongs arrived they were the same scissor type shown in the main picture. The one we got is exactly the same ad the rest of us have and I'm sure they will last my brother for years as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hjort

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tongs for our RV. We camp one week each month and have frequent fires despite the summer heat! LOL! The tongs fold in half which is handy for storage in the basement of our RV and are strong enough to move large logs around in our campfires. Exactly the tool I needed and wanted. No more singed fingers or using other pieces of wood to move logs around in an active fire. Could not find tongs locally because they are "out of season." The shipment arrived as promised. I am a happy camper!
customer_reviews.author: sunseeker4126

customer_reviews.title: Only for small logs
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are of decent quality but can only handle small logs. Most of my logs are 3x3x16. It handled those fine. But 4x4 or larger ended up bending the tongs. I bent them back in shape, but I don't see them lasting more then a couple seasons. More than likely the rivets will pop out when the tongs bend under weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite happy.  Would order again if vaporized by aliens.
customer_reviews.text: I did not spend much effort researching tongs and as such didn't have much expectations for this set. In fact, I purchased these after quite a brief search on Amazon. Regardless, I was quite happy and a bit surprised when I unboxed them. The construction is quite well albeit simple. I have been using these for a week or so now in my wood burning fireplace insert. If I were to find something that I could complain about it would be the size. Having not really paid attention when I ordered them they ended up being a bit larger than I need. In conclusion, I am quite satisfied overall. Would order again in the event that mine disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: J. Claußen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Received these today and put them to use and they seem to do the job. I was shocked that the item in the picture was not even close to what I received. I was confused when such a small box arrived and then realized they were an accordion type tongs. The picture in the reviews are correct but on the listing shows a rigid set of tongs which I thought I was getting. These suffice just the same and take up less space so I'm happy. let's just hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: OK for small light stuff, but cant handle logs of weight great
customer_reviews.text: Sort of flimsy. Ive had it for awhile and its sort of bending and will no longer grasp small logs well
customer_reviews.author: A. Z.

customer_reviews.title: a very good tool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this inexpensive set of fire tongs for my outdoor fireplace. I love it. These tongs are constructed strong enough to easily pick up a heavy log for repositioning it in the fire. They are not as decorative as my indoor fireplace tools, and they do not need to be. They do the job as good, or better.
customer_reviews.author: hantayo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Don't use the fireplace much, but this was a great budget solution for me to avoid buying a multi-tool set for the fireplace. Yes they are designed only to pick up larger logs, it takes some maneuvering when you want to move wood that is smaller than the circle at the end.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great for firepit
customer_reviews.text: I have an expensive brass set for the wood burning fireplace, but needed something for the fire pit in the backyard. Sturdy, excellent quality with grip holes sized for man sized hands. If you love you backyard fire pit or even have a charcoal grill, these tongs are for you!
customer_reviews.author: YosemiteSam

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: We needed these shorter 26" tongs so they wouldn't be too long for our hanging rack, and were happy to find these. But, a week after receiving them, the local hardware store had a basket full of the same ones at half the price. Nothing fancy, but they do the job for which they are intended.
customer_reviews.author: ellis

customer_reviews.title: dont believe what you read
customer_reviews.text: i read all iof the reviews about this item. well, my take on it is dont believe what you read. i was extremely impressed with these tongs, my husband adores then and it even worked well int he house with pretty heavy pieces of wood for my fireplace. definitely a recommened item from me.
customer_reviews.author: monique

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Collapses down for storage
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Collapses down for storage,and easy to move small and medium sized logs. Have not used this to move large stump size logs, but presuming it would not work great and we do not burn logs that large.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Actually a little better than I expected considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Actually a little better than I expected considering the price. Arrived on time and worked well for moving burning logs around.
customer_reviews.author: malcolm4572

customer_reviews.title: Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I need or I suppose expected. Although I suppose if I lower the expectation, this would be OK to push wood around in an outdoor fire pit. The metal bends before the joints of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: blah
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star rating, but after a few days of using it started to break
customer_reviews.author: Goldsmith/Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great tool but the metal it's made of is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool but the metal it's made of is very weak and will bend if the logs being picked up are heavier. Perfect for repositioning the burning logs though!
customer_reviews.author: GN

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the fireplace tool set I liked didn't come with a pair of tongs. These were not only reasonably priced, but I have yet to find a piece of would that would fit in my fireplace that these tongs couldn't move. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Pxkatz

customer_reviews.title: fireplace tongs
customer_reviews.text: I received this item very quickly and in good condition. It is just as described. It works well. It is not as sturdy as a tong made of cast iron but it does the job ok. Great addition to my fireplace tools.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I personally think that this style of tongs work best. They reach well into the firebox farther and release well. These particular ones are not as heavy duty as the ones they replaced, but thet work just fine with the size of split wood I burn.
customer_reviews.author: Archi
